net.semanticmetadata.lire.filter

Class RerankFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.semanticmetadata.lire.filter.RerankFilter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SearchHitsFilter

    public class RerankFilter
extends java.lang.Object
implements SearchHitsFilter
    A result list is re-ranked based on the given query. Example usage is: you first do a search with feature X and then re-rank the results with feature Y. Created 03.08.11, 10:28
    Author:
    Mathias Lux, mathias@juggle.at
